body: Sylphs with this racial trait feel kinship toward the creatures of the air, and can use speak with animals once per day to speak to birds or other flying animals. Her caster level for these effects is equal to her level. This racial trait replaces the sylph's spell-like ability racial trait.
name: Sky Speaker
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Sylphs/Alternate Racial Traits/Sky Speaker
